full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 113 of 247 241 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross

1 Q. And you built a house there?
2 A. I built the house there, yes.
3 Q. So from about 2000 onwards when you flew to the ranch, you'd stay at your home?
4 A. That is correct.
5 Q. Let me ask you briefly about the trips to Epstein's island in the Virgin Islands. You said that's Little St. James Island?
6 A. That's correct.
7 Q. When you flew to the Virgin Islands, you didn't fly directly into little St. James, you said; right?
8 A. No.
9 Q. It doesn't have an airstrip?
10 A. That's correct.
11 Q. You flew to St. Thomas, which is the bigger island right by?
12 A. That is correct.
13 Q. You flew Epstein and his guests to Little St. James in a helicopter?
14 A. Correct.
15 Q. Because you're a trained helicopter pilot?
16 A. That is correct.
17 Q. Where did you stay when you went on the trips to the Virgin Islands?
18 A. Typical hotel, Marriott Resorts that were there.

SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00017475
